summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Harbor Code, amending Sections 2, 3, 5, 6, 7, 8, 10 and 28 of Ordinance 87983, as amended, and adding sections thereto, to regulate aircraft on the water and the use of waterways and submerged streets under permit; to provide for the regulation of the movement of and the impounding of vessels, watercraft and obstructions and charges therefor, to revise the definition of Fairway, and add definitions thereto; creating a Waterway Operation and Maintenance Fund, and providing for deposits in and expenditures from such fund.
